name: Looter Hero - Burglar Simulator
description:
Looter Hero - Burglar Simulator

Download: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thedgames.looterhero

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/looterhero

Be quick, sneaky and grab tons of loots! Watch out for the police and become the hero of thieves!

Collect all money, value and object. Be rich while you loot houses. Drive to house, pick up all things what you can, go back to your car and leave the scene before police caught you. Rob as much house as you can do. Looter Hero is the best way to make fun.

Features:

- Beautiful 3D graphics

- Easy gameplay
